title: Ranked AFK
body: I have been playing ranked and there has been too many AFK on either my team or the enemy team. What I don't get is why we have to suffer the points lost because 1 or more of my teammates left the game after the 3 min mark and caused us to lose. Why do we lose points? Could there be a no points loss scenario.

replies.body: time to duo/flex using my smurf... ah damn.. we are losing.... ima just afk so no one has to lose points... just my smurf anyways.
